Class Roles

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.server.auth.Roles
public final class Roles extends Object
Standard roles for JScience Grid role-based access control.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    ADMIN
    System administrator - full access to all operations
    static final String
    ANONYMOUS
    Anonymous/unauthenticated user - minimal access
    static final String
    SCIENTIST
    Scientific researcher - can submit/manage computations
    static final String
    VIEWER
    Read-only observer - can view status but not modify
    static final String
    WORKER
    Worker node - can request and complete tasks

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static boolean
    canManageWorkers(String role)
    Check if the given role can manage workers.
    static boolean
    canSubmitTasks(String role)
    Check if the given role can submit tasks.
    static boolean
    canViewStatus(String role)
    Check if the given role can view grid status.
    static boolean
    isAdmin(String role)
    Check if the given role has admin privileges.
